case_title: AZIZ-UR-REHMAN vs AZAD GOVERNMENT OF THE STATE OF JAMMU AND KASHMIR AND ANOTHER
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
respondents: Azad Government of the State of Jammu and Kashmir

key_points.impugned_order_nature: Transfer order, not appealable under law
key_points.legal_basis: Service Tribunal Act, 1975 (Proviso b(i) to Section 4)
